description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Remote Desktop Client associated with CVE-2024-43533:

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates for your version of Windows 11 from the official Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2, apply [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284).
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285).
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, also apply [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285).
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2, apply [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280).
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This set of updates addresses the use-after-free vulnerability in the Remote Desktop Client that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code. Ensure that your system is on one of the specified builds before applying the updates.
Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
